PositionSensorVRDeviceGetImmediateState.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The getImmediateState() method of the interface returns the current instantaneous position sensor state. This is intended to only be used rarely, for certain special uses, for example sampling the immediate position of a hand orientation sensor — or at least it will be, in the future.

remarks.para: For most standard uses, you'll probably want to use instead.
